title: Perfect Yoni Organic Women's Probiotic - Vaginal Health Supplement | Perfect Yoni - 60 Capsules of Probiotics for Women
descriptionHtml: PERFECT YONI Feminine PH balance Perfect Yoni Organic Women's Probiotic combines a powerful proprietary blend of natural, organic ingredients designed to promote a balanced vaginal flora, support yeast levels, and maintain healthy pH balance. Free from artificial additives, this supplement is tailored to support optimal vaginal health and overall wellness. The unique blend of herbs, extracts, and nutrients works synergistically to stabilize vaginal health and restore natural balance. Vaginal Health Supplement Proprietary Blend (745mg): Pumpkin Extract (Semen moschatae - Seed): Known for its antioxidant properties, Pumpkin Seed Extract is rich in nutrients that support overall immunity and digestive health. It also plays a role in maintaining hormonal balance, essential for vaginal health. Sarsaparilla Extract (Smilax china L. - Root): Sarsaparilla has traditionally been used to detoxify the body and improve circulation. It’s often linked to supporting hormonal balance and reducing inflammation in the body, which can impact vaginal health. Muira Puama Extract (Ptychopetalum olacoides - Bark): Muira Puama is a potent adaptogen known for its ability to support sexual health and energy levels. It has also been linked to enhanced libido and hormone regulation, beneficial for vaginal wellness. Oat Straw Extract (Avena sativa L. - Straw): Oat Straw is known for its soothing and anti-inflammatory properties. It also supports healthy blood flow, which can improve overall tissue health, including the delicate tissues of the vaginal area. Boron (Amino Acid Chelate): Boron is a trace mineral that plays an essential role in maintaining bone health, but it’s also believed to regulate estrogen levels, supporting vaginal health and hormone balance. Cayenne Pepper Extract (Capsicum annuum - Fruit): Cayenne Pepper is well-known for its ability to improve circulation and metabolism. It may also help in promoting a healthy pH balance, which is essential for vaginal health and preventing odor. Catuaba Extract (Erythroxylum catuaba - Bark): Catuaba is an Amazonian herb traditionally used to support the nervous system and increase energy. It is also believed to help with hormone regulation and improving overall sexual health. Licorice Extract (Glycyrrhiza uralensis - Root): Licorice has powerful anti-inflammatory and anti-bacterial properties. It can help soothe irritated tissues and balance the vaginal microbiome, reducing the risk of infections and promoting healthy flora. Tribulus Terrestris (Whole Herb): This herb is commonly used to support healthy hormone levels and sexual function. It may help balance female hormones, which is crucial for maintaining vaginal health. Orchic (Substance): Orchic is derived from testicular extract, believed to support overall vitality and hormone balance. It’s typically used to boost reproductive health and improve energy levels. Oyster Extract: Rich in zinc, Oyster Extract supports immune function and plays a role in hormone regulation, which is important for maintaining vaginal health and fertility. Astragalus Extract (Astragalus membranaceus - Root): Known for its immune-boosting properties, Astragalus helps enhance the body’s defense systems, which supports overall health, including the delicate balance of the vaginal flora. Nettle Extract (Urtica dioica): Nettle is packed with vitamins and minerals that help nourish and support the body. It is often used for its anti-inflammatory effects and to promote a healthy urinary tract and hormone balance.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support vaginal health and pH balance with Perfect Yoni Organic Women's Probiotic. Powerful blend with Tongkat Ali, Maca, L-Arginine, Ginseng, and proprietary herbal formula promotes feminine wellness and hormonal balance. 60 capsules.
